metadata.name: The Flame of Burning Time
metadata.description:
My Genesis NFT on Foundation holds a very special place in my life. I have written few lines to describe the photograph 


The glorious Sun descending into the never-ending chase of the horizon

The tempestuous waves thrashing the shore, 
In its endeavour to captivate the sand 

The ignited clouds setting the sky ablaze, 
with a burning desire to glow with thunder 

In this reunion of nature's most fiery lovers, my eyes await for my moon. 

In the title "The Flame of Burning Time", flame signifies the undying love as the time burns to keep it going. 

Special co-credits to JP to help me with this shot.
